# CKSyncEngineSyncReason.manual

**Case**

A manual sync operation.

## Declaration

```swift
case manual
```

## Discussion

The sync engine uses this reason only when your app invokes the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKSyncEngine-4b4w9/fetchChangesWithCompletionHandler:] and [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKSyncEngine-4b4w9/sendChangesWithCompletionHandler:] methods and their variants.

## Sync reasons

- **CKSyncEngineSyncReason.scheduled**: A scheduled sync operation.
title: CKSyncEngineSyncReason.manual
